name: Luck Is Me (Proof of Concept) Game
name_original: Luck Is Me (Proof of Concept) Game
description: Luck Is Me (Proof of Concept) Game based off the YouTube channel "Luck Is Me." The 4 major interaction types of the game are featured. It's an exploration game based of the Jokes and world of "Luck Is Me" and was made with his permission. This game is short, but if you're wanting more at the end of it, consider the concept proved.
